long_description: The Novara Madrona is an obstacle-eating 29er built for women. Responsive, nimble and outfitted with hydraulic disc brakes, its sturdy frame, Suntour XCR fork and burly tires tame the trail. Women-specific, hydroformed aluminum frame features a shaped top tube to offer an optimized fit while maintaining strength and handling performance. SR Suntour XCR LO 29 suspension fork delivers 80mm of travel and saves weight with magnesium lowers; preload adjustment and lockout tune the ride. Truvativ triple crankset is paired with a wide-ranging cassette to power the 27 gear combinations, making easy work of conquering climbs and cruising descents. SRAM X5 trigger shifters guide the X5 rear derailleur and Microshift front derailleur for responsive, precise shifts. Tektro Gemini hydraulic disc brakes maintain consistent performance in all conditions. Weinmann rims use double-wall construction for strength and are decked out with WTB Nano Comp tires for excellent traction. Specs on our Novara Madrona 29er women's hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
